Name: Demolisher

BodyParts.Name: Head
BodyParts.Description: Demolisher becomes blinded until the end of the next round.

BodyParts.Name: Armament
BodyParts.Description: Demolisher gets +1 curse on all its melee attacks. Destroyed Demolisher armament can be sold for 2 dust.

PhasesDescription: Starts in Lumbering. Phase change triggers instantly when bloodied.

Actions.Name: Hurl Rock
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 takes [fray] damage and is branded, then must save or be shoved 3.
Actions.PostAction: After this action resolves, summon a size 1 piece of terrain adjacent to their original location.

Actions.Name: Lash
Actions.Description: The Demolisher whips a chain, hook, or tongue around a foe in range 5. They take 3 piercing damage and are shoved to an adjacent space to the Demolisher.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: Dash 6. All characters it passes over are shoved 1 to the side and take [D].

Actions.Name: Pound
Actions.PostAttack: Deals 2[D] against characters suffering from a status.

Combos.Name: Roar
Combos.Description: End turn. Characters in range 3 take physical piercing damage, become winded, and are shoved 1 towards the Demolisher. Can use smash.

Combos.Name: Smash
Combos.PostAction: End turn and combo returns to Pound.

Traits.Name: Tantrum
Traits.Description: Gain hatred of the closest character at the start of each of its turns. Can choose if multiple characters are close.

Traits.Name: True Enrage
Traits.Description: Gain unstoppable and +1 action at 25% hp.
